text: Owen County is a county in the U.S. state of Kentucky. As of the 2020 census, the population was 11,278. Its county seat is Owenton. == Communities == === Cities === * Gratz * Monterey * Owenton (county seat) * Sparta (partly in Gallatin County) === Unincorporated communities === * Hesler * Long Ridge * Lusby's Mill * Needmore * New Columbus * New Liberty * Perry Park * Pleasant Home * Squiresville * Sweet Owen * Wheatley === Ghost town === * Ep == References == Category:1810s establishments in Kentucky Category:1819 establishments in Kentucky Category:Kentucky counties
title: Owen County, Kentucky
